channel.title: Jonin Run Season 2+ (3 for me)
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Jonin Run Season 2+ (3 for me)"

item.title: Re: Jonin Run Season 2+ (3 for me)
Re: Jonin Run Season 2+ (3 for me)
item.content:encoded: well for a jonin run then just the silver elixers should do fine, but try doing your missions first just to be sure, though what i did was just use 5 silvers.

item.title: Jonin Run Season 2+ (3 for me)
item.content:encoded: This is my second time I'm about to start the Jonin Run and I have 20,000 ryo stored up, I have Crazy Love Triangle, 4 Blood-Lines, I have Annie Level 2 and have 3 Silver Elixirs. I'm going to use the Diet Ramen so I can use all 3, and am going to use the Girl Power Team with Annie Level 2, Pinky Level 2, and Rover's Mom. I know that I can beat B-Ranks with that team. My question is: what else should I have in preparation for this years run?
